did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Rida Barnard and Diane Phillips letters, 1969-1970.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Love letters between two women, Barnard and Phillips, while Phillips was in Greeley, Colorado and Barnard was in Waukegan, Illinois, consisting of a Valentine's card from Phillips sent February 11, 1970, and 24 cards and letters from Barnard sent between October 19, 1969 and March 30, 1970. Sometimes Barnard sent several letters on the same day.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Love letters between two women, Barnard and Phillips, while Phillips was in Greeley, Colorado and Barnard was in Waukegan, Illinois, consisting of a Valentine's card from Phillips sent February 11, 1970, and 24 cards and letters from Barnard sent between October 19, 1969 and March 30, 1970. Sometimes Barnard sent several letters on the same day.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Rida Barnard and Diane Phillips letters, #. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
